# Heritage and Communities Trust

| type            = Parent Charity

The Heritage and Communities Trust is a charity based in Walthamstow, in the London Borough of Waltham Forest. It is the parent organisation of two museums; Markfield Beam Engine and Museum, and Walthamstow Pumphouse Museum. Both museums were previously independent, but merged in 2025. The trust is based in Walthamstow.
As yet, the Trust does not have a website.
See also
* Walthamstow Pumphouse Museum
* Markfield Beam Engine and Museum
